abstract: Former American intelligence contractor Edward J Snowden says he would like to return to United States after two years asylum in Russia and is seeking legal and impartial trial.
lead_paragraph: The lawyer said he was working with a team of Americans and Germans on legal issues that would allow for the former intelligence contractor’s return.

headline.main: Snowden Seeks to Return Home to U.S., His Lawyer Says
headline.print_headline: Russia: Snowden’s Return to U.S. Depends on Fair Trial, Lawyer Says

snippet: The lawyer said he was working with a team of Americans and Germans on legal issues that would allow for the former intelligence contractor’s return.
